StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecrui.ngPersonnel]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@LastName varchar(20), @FirstName varchar(20), @SSN varchar(9), @BilletFromDate date.me, @BilletToDate date.me, @MosId varchar(4), @Billet varchar(20), @DaysSinceUpdate int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT Top 200 T.ID, T.Billet, P.LAST_NAME, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, P.SUFFIX_CD, M.rowguid, MC.GENDER_CODE, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, R.RANK_CODE, M.BILLET_MOS, R.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE, RR.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, O.ORGANIZATION_ID, O.Name Organiza.onName, O_PARENT.Name ParentOrganiza.onName, R.EMAIL_ADDRESS, R.ON_PRODUCTION, DATEDIFF(DAY, T.LastUpdatedDate, GETDATE()) AS DaysSinceLastUpdated, BRC.ClassNumber, BRC.GradDate FROM USMC.vwMcrissPerson P LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarine AS M ON P.PERSON_ID = M.MARINE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissMarineCandidate AS MC on MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson AS R on M.MARINE_ID = R.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS O ON O.ORGANIZATION_ID = R.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngRole AS RR on R.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = RR.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS T on M.rowguid = T.RecruiterId LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.BRC as BRC on T.BRCID = BRC.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN mcriss.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP as OM on OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = R.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on AS O_PARENT ON O_PARENT.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE (@LastName is null or (P.LAST_NAME like @LastName + '%')) and (@FirstName is null or (P.FIRST_NAME like @FirstName + '%')) and (@SSN is null or (P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN)) and (@MosId = 0 or (M.BILLET_MOS = @MosId)) and (@Billet is null or (RR.SHORT_DESCRIPTION = @Billet)) and (@DaysSinceUpdate = 0 or (DATEDIFF(DAY, T.LastUpdatedDate, GETDATE()) <= @DaysSinceUpdate)) and (@BilletFromDate is null or (R.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE >= @BilletFromDate)) and (@BilletToDate is null or (R.BILLET_BEGIN_DATE <= @BilletToDate))
END
